name: Karun Chandhok
status: Driving in FIA World Endurance Championship
introduction: Karun Chandhok, is an Indian racing driver who made his Formula One debut in the 2010 season racing for the HRT team. After being replaced mid-way through the 2010 season, Chandhok became a member of the BBC Radio 5 Live Commentary team for the rest of the 2010 season. The following year he was employed by Lotus as their test and reserve driver in which he replaced Jarno Trulli for one round in Germany.
